title: Triptych Window from the Coonley Playhouse, Riverside, Illinois
medium: Clear and colored leaded glass in oak frames
dimensions:
Center panel: 35 1/4 × 43 in. (89.5 × 109.2 cm)
Two side panels: 36 × 7 3/4 in. (91.4 × 19.7 cm) (each)
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Purchased with funds provided by Dr. and Mrs. Edwin J. DeCosta and the Walter E. Heller Foundation
